title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Service Animals
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Service Animals              Service Animals       Service animals must be leashed at all times. They are allowed in all park facilities and on all park trails unless closed by order of the superintendent. However, some park trails are very steep and require the use of iron hand rails. These trails should be avoided:  Mary Ellen Kramer Park Stairs Garret Mountain Yellow Trail Hike Route
